The traveler's invocation at dawn.ARABIC_TEXT: ((سَمَّعَ سَامِعٌ بِحَمْدِ اللَّهِ، وَحُسْنِ بَلاَئِهِ عَلَيْنَا، رَبَّنَا صاحِبْنَا، وَأَفْضِلْ عَلَيْنَا، عَائِذاً بِاللَّهِ مِنَ النَّارِ)).
The traveler's invocation at dawn.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (SamiAAa samiAAun bihamdil-lahi wahusni bala-ihi AAalayna. Rabbana sahibna wa-afdil AAalayna AAa-ithan billahi minan-nar.)
The traveler's invocation at dawn.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (May a witness, be witness to our praise of Allah for His favours and bounties upon us.  Our Lord, protect us, show favour on us and deliver us from every evil.  I take refuge in Allah from the fire.)
